entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 13 except minus 6 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023
